meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Allen Park Nichole Mancone Kris Hamilton Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6509.

td.p: Allen Park, a refugee affairs officer from Washington, D.C.
Nichole Mancone, a college registrar from Providence, Rhode Island
Kris Hamilton, a computer technician from Dublin, Ohio (whose 3-day cash winnings total $60,301)

tr.td: ANAGRAMMED AMERICA
SCHOOLING AROUND
YOUR CHOICE OF 3
HIGH SCORERS
IRAN
ENDS IN "Y"
